description: Play on words involving bird sounds and names
title: Bird Confusion
n_1: Rooster greets the morning sun with a loud crow.
n_2: Crow tries to imitate Rooster's crowing but fails.
c2_2: This is harder than it looks!
n_3: Rooster tries to teach Crow the right technique.
n_4: They both laugh as Crow fails again humorously.
